metadata.feature_description: Modify user's reputation and experience points with validation and note tracking

steps.action: Navigate to Users panel and select Regular TestUser
steps.expected: User list should display with user activity options
steps.actual: Users panel displayed with Regular TestUser visible

steps.action: Click on User Activity icon for Regular TestUser
steps.expected: Activity panel should expand showing user metrics
steps.actual: Activity panel expanded showing Rank, Reputation, Experience, and Edit Points link

steps.expected: Edit mode should activate with editable fields
steps.actual: Edit mode activated - Reputation and Experience became editable textboxes, Notes field appeared, Cancel and Save buttons displayed

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edit reputation points with valid value

steps.action: In edit mode, change Reputation from 6 to 10
steps.expected: Reputation textbox should accept the new value

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edit experience points with valid value

steps.action: In edit mode, change Experience from 6 to 20
steps.expected: Experience textbox should accept the new value

steps.action: Enter multiline note in Notes field
steps.expected: Notes field should accept multiline text
steps.actual: Multiline note entered successfully with 3 lines of text explaining the changes

steps.action: Click Save button after entering valid Rep=10, Exp=20, and note
steps.expected: Changes should be saved and UI should reflect new values
steps.actual: Save successful - UI updated to show Reputation=10, Experience=20, Rank recalculated to 4, Last Active changed to 'moments ago'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Cancel changes and verify reset to original values

steps.action: Enter edit mode and change Rep to 99, Exp to 150
steps.expected: Values should be changed in form
Values should reset to original (Rep=10, Exp=20)
steps.actual: Values reset to Reputation=10, Experience=20 - edit mode closed

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Attempt to set negative experience (validation error)

steps.action: Enter edit mode and set Experience to -5
steps.expected: Negative value should be accepted in textbox
Validation error should appear preventing save
steps.actual: Error message displayed: 'Experience points can not be negative' - save blocked

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Attempt to set reputation greater than experience (validation error)

steps.expected: Values should be accepted in textboxes
Validation error should appear preventing save
steps.actual: Error message displayed: 'Reputation points can not be more than experience' - save blocked

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify changes reflected immediately in UI

steps.action: After saving valid changes, verify UI updates
steps.expected: All values should update immediately without page refresh
steps.actual: UI immediately reflected: Reputation=10, Experience=20, Rank=4 (recalculated), Last Active='moments ago'

steps.expected: Notes field should support and display multiline text
steps.actual: Multiline note displayed correctly with line breaks preserved: 'Test adjustment of user points.\nLine 2: Increased reputation from 6 to 10.\nLine 3: Increased experience from 6 to 20.'

observations: The Edit Points feature is only available when the site is running DNNSOCIAL SKU, as determined by utilities.getSKU() check in the React component
The EDIT_POINTS permission is required to access this feature, verified in EvoqUsersController.cs
Delta calculation is performed when user has existing score - new values are subtracted from current values before saving
The adhoc scoring action is recorded via Mechanics_SaveUserScore stored procedure
Error messages are displayed as toast notifications that automatically dismiss after a few seconds
